citation.case_name: Angle, Nevada State Assembly Member v. Guinn, Governor of Nevada

html:
541 U.S. 957

ANGLE, NEVADA STATE ASSEMBLY MEMBER, ET AL.
v.
GUINN, GOVERNOR OF NEVADA, ET AL.

No. 03-1037.

Supreme Court of United States.

March 22, 2004.

1

Sup. Ct. Nev. Motions of Initiative and Referendum Institute, Pacific Legal Foundation et al., and National Taxpayers Union et al. for leave to file briefs as amici curiae granted. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 119 Nev. 277, 71 P. 3d 1269, and 119 Nev. 460, 76 P. 3d 22.
